Spotted Fever Rickettsiosis (Tests for Rickettsia Spotted Fever Group Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    11482-7 Rickettsia rickettsii RNA [Presence] in Tissue by NAA with probe detection
    17537-2 Rickettsia spotted fever group RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    17538-0 Rickettsia spotted fever group RNA [Presence] in Serum by Probe
    48868-4 Rickettsia rickettsii DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    48870-0 Rickettsia spotted fever group DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    8005-1 Rickettsia rickettsii RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
